author: MetalTxus (Jes√∫s Miguel Cruz Cana)
description: Bookmarks ongoing events and more so you do not have to and provides bookmarks to the most useful sections.
name: gbf-bookmarker

scripts.build: rimraf build && yarn build-folders && yarn clean-build-folders && yarn copy-build-folders
scripts.build-folders: rimraf build && mkdir build && cp -r assets build/assets && cp -r src build/src && cp -r vendor build/vendor
scripts.clean-build-folders: rimraf build/**/*.scss && rimraf build/**/*.css.map && rimraf build/**/*.md
scripts.copy-build-folders: git checkout release && rimraf assets && rimraf src && rimraf vendor && mv build/* . && rimraf build
